attributes.action: Increase sentence for car theft, and joy riding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no deterrent for car theft or joy riding, how many more people must die, or be injured by being run over by the thief stealing a car.
Car crime cost is out of control.
I ask the Prime Minister to increase the penalty for car theft.
A 5 years minimum sentence for car theft.
